snippet: The show, opening in February, will delve deeply into what one of its curators, Lauren Cornell, describes as “a contemporary condition wherein we are encircled by a ‘smarter’ and more participatory world.”
abstract: The show, opening in February, will delve deeply into what one of its curators, Lauren Cornell, describes as “a contemporary condition wherein we are encircled by a ‘smarter’ and more participatory world.”

headline.main: New Museum Triennial to Examine the 'Surround Audience'
